job_description:
• Education: Enrolled in a Bachelor’s or Master’s program in Electrical or Electronic Engineering with relevant coursework Interfaces Knowledge: Understanding of serial interfaces like USB, I2C, UART, SPI.
• USB Type-C knowledge is a plus Firmware Development: Assist in developing and customizing firmware to meet specific customer requirements Soft Skills: Strong teamwork, communication, and problem-solving skills with a customer-focused mindset Programming Knowledge: Basic experience with firmware development in C and debugging tools Lab Skills: Familiarity with lab equipment such as oscilloscopes and protocol analyzers Power Management: Basic knowledge of power circuits like DC-DC converters or LDOs.
